DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to the adjudication of the central reviewer and participating organization's assessment of the diagnostic imaging.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Central Reviewer Participating Organization Adjudication Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the adjudication of the central reviewer and participating organization's assessment of the diagnostic imaging.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredName: Central Reviewer Participating Organization Adjudication Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols , or other data.:An organization associated with the Lead Organization and is active in the conduct of the research.:The final judgment in a legal proceeding.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A single person who critically evaluates and reports on laboratory test results, protocols, or other data.
An organization associated with the Lead Organization and is active in the conduct of the research.
The final judgment in a legal proceeding.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
